newsitem.title: USA: Famous Dave's to open Wisconsin restaurant.
newsitem.headline: Famous Dave's to open Wisconsin restaurant.

text.p: Famous Dave's of America Inc said Wednesday it signed a 10-year lease to open and operate a second Famous Dave's Bar-B-Que restaurant in Madison, Wis.
The 4,800-square-foot building is expected to open in December 1997. The restaurant will have indoor seating for approximately 100 guests.
The first Famous Dave's Bar-B-Que in Madison is scheduled to open in August 1997.

Famous Dave's of America develops, owns and operates American roadhouse-style barbecue restaurants under the name Famous Dave's. The company currently operates five Famous Dave's restaurants, with nine locations now in development.
